question: What happens if you decide to invest $0.40 during a round?
a: I get to keep $0.60 for myself, and the other $0.40 gets quadrupled to $1.60. The slot machine will then return some portion of it.
b: I get to keep $0.40 for myself, and then the other $0.60 gets tripled to $1.80. The slot machine then gives me back half of it.

question: What happens when you press the red button?
a: I will be asked to select one of three slot machines to play on that round.
b: I will be randomly paired with one of three slot machines on that round.

question: What is the best strategy for success in this game?
a: To try to receive as much money as possible on each round as two of my rounds will be randomly selected to determine my bonus payment.
b: To try to accrue as many points as possible, as the total number of points will determine my bonus payment.
